Title: ↩️ 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- -I would say that the situation on our part of the ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Ukrainian Commander-In-Chief, Oleksandr Syrskyi, has transferred the 128th Brigade from Volchans'k (Kharkov direction) to the Pokrovsk sector. Russian forces have captured 37 sqkm of area in the Pokrovsk direction in less than 48 hours. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- -I would say that the situation on our part of the front has worsened. We are receiving even less ammunition than before, and the Russians are putting pressure on us,- – Ivan Sekach, Spokesman for the Ukrainian 110th Brigade which operates in the Pokrovsk direction, commenting on the -success of the Ukrainian Armed Forces in Kursk- at the -cost- of the rest of the front-line.
